Interface IO.ITester

  • Enclosing class:
    IO

    public static interface IO.ITester
    Instances of the interface ITester are testing objects which want to be informed about interesting events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void inform(java.lang.Object message)
      Reports calling the method IO.inform(Object) and pass the text in the argument.
      void pause(int ms)
      Reports a call of the method IO.pause(int) and pass the set time in the argument.

        Reports calling the method IO.inform(Object) and pass the text in the argument.

        message - The shown text

        void pause(int ms)
        Reports a call of the method IO.pause(int) and pass the set time in the argument.
